questions.question: What is the name of the product or system being tested?
questions.description: Used throughout the document to identify the system under test

questions.question: What is the version number of this test strategy document?
Who is the owner of this test strategy document?
questions.placeholder: e.g., QA Lead or Engineering Team
questions.description: Identifies responsibility for maintaining the document

questions.question: Who will approve this test strategy document?
questions.description: Identifies the approver for document sign-off

questions.question: What is the last updated date for this document?
questions.description: Tracks when the document was last modified

questions.question: Describe your overall testing strategy approach for this product.
questions.placeholder: Outline your testing philosophy, methodology, and high-level approach...
questions.description: Provides the strategic direction for all testing activities

questions.question: What features, components, or activities are IN SCOPE for testing?
questions.placeholder:
List each item on a new line, e.g.:
- User authentication module
- Payment processing API
- Mobile app UI
- Database migrations
questions.description: Defines what will be tested to set clear boundaries

questions.question: What features, components, or activities are OUT OF SCOPE for testing?
questions.placeholder:
List each item on a new line, e.g.:
- Third-party integrations
- Legacy data migration
- Performance testing beyond 1000 users
questions.description: Explicitly excludes items to prevent scope creep

questions.question: What testing levels will you implement and who is responsible for each?
questions.description: Defines the testing hierarchy and ownership

questions.question: What are the specific testing responsibilities for each team role?
questions.description: Clarifies who does what in the testing process

questions.question: What testing environments will you use and what is the purpose of each?
questions.description: Defines the environment strategy for testing phases

questions.question: How do you classify defect severity levels in your project?
What testing metrics will you track and how will you report them?
questions.placeholder: Describe your metrics (test coverage, defect density, etc.) and reporting frequency/format...
questions.description: Defines how testing progress and quality will be measured and communicated
